title: Diamond Support main, I wish to help and teach others~ (convosation, vod review, teaching)
body:
Hello, I'm Suero, A Diamond Sona one trick. I'm not so much for teaching mechanical outplays but rather Macro as it covers a large spectrum to performing well as a support.

I enjoy  helping others if it's  general knowledge, tips or analytical to others form their Vods or statistics.

If you wish to ask anything in regarding Support or help, feel free to add "Suero".

replies.body: Just wanted to leave a message here for anybody else who glances upon this thread, I have only just met Suero and I've already learnt more in about an hours worth of discussion than so many videos around! I definitely recommend taking up the offer that Suero has been kind enough to offer, crazy that it's free of charge but it goes to show the nature of the person clearly!

Happy to share my experiences, Suero is brilliant, my winrate increased dramatically after getting advice and support from this brilliant human. If you have the chance, its worth your time. This ninja is amazing.

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}
